metadata.title: Timber Harvest - EVOS Database

creators.name: Alaska Department of Natural Resources (DNR), Division of Forestry

metadata.description: Data Type: Exxon Valdez Oil Spill;  Past and Predicted (1993) timber harvest areas for selected throughout EVOS area delineated by  Alaska Department of Natural Resources, Division of Forestry, and Alaska Department of Fish and Game title 16 permit process. These areas include eastern Prince William Sound, southern Montague Island, southern tip of Kenai Peninsula and Afognak Island. Predicted harvest areas are very general and indicate ongoing nature of industry filing of intent to harvest. On Afognak Island, ADNR, Division of Forestry has been working with KONCOR Native corporation to detail the harvest history. Intended use as a resource layer for use in damage assessment, and habitat restoration for the spill affected area.
